Config Definition File - application exampleÔÉÅ

 1# mgconfig configuration definitions 
 2# for basic application configuration
 3
 4- section: application
 5  prefix: app
 6  configs:
 7
 8  - name: name
 9    type: str
10    readonly: True
11    description: name of the application (read only)
12
13  - name: basedir
14    type: path
15    readonly: True
16    default: /$(app_name)_data
17    env: DATA_DIRECTORY
18    description: base directory for application execution
19
20  - name: configdir
21    type: path
22    readonly: True
23    default: $(app_basedir)/configs
24    env: CONFIG_DIRECTORY
25    description: configuration directory (read only)
26
27  - name: configfile
28    type: path
29    readonly: True
30    default: $(app_configdir)/$(app_name)_config.yaml
31    env: CONFIGFILE
32    description: full pathname of configuration file (read only)
33
34- section: secure_store
35  prefix: sec
36  configs:
37
38  - name: securestore_file
39    type: path
40    readonly: True
41    default: '$(app_configdir)/$(app_name)_sec.json'
42    env: SECURESTORE_FILE
43    description: filepath of secure store file
44
45  - name: master_key_keystore
46    type: str
47    readonly: True
48    default: env
49    description:
50
51
52  - name: master_key_item_name
53    type: str
54    readonly: True
55    default: APP_KEY
56    description: item name for master key for protection of secure storage (read only) (never displayed)
57
58  - name: keyring_service_name
59    type: str
60    readonly: True
61    env: KEYRING_SERVICE
62    default: mgconfig_test
63    description:
64
65
66  - name: keyfile_filepath
67    type: path
68    readonly: True
69    env: KEYFILE_PATH
70    default: $(app_basedir)/configs
71    description:

See the Configuration Definition section for the full configuration definition reference.
